title: Transitional slab serif/ egyptienne font?
content:
I find these historic IBM fonts fascinating. There use of the word THINK was so diverse historically. Can anybody ID the font on this plaque?

Thanks so much for the help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [THINK\_plaque.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130324024319/http:/typophile.com/files/THINK_plaque.jpg) | 170.93 KB |
author: jmryhal

comments.content:
ITC Cheltenham Condensed Std is the closest.

[various Cheltenhams](http://web.archive.org/web/20130324024319/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=cheltenham&sample_text=Download%20Me%20Now!&gclid=CNemgMKGs54CFRCY2AodPgjKlQ)

Nick Cooke
